children.text: mercury:: subtypes:: caste (after emanation from the well)
etānyeva samāni ca kṛtvā dravyāṇi mardayecca dinam //
tasyās tv adhordhvaṃ pradadīta gomayaṃ śītīkṛtā gavyaghṛtena bharjitā /
yaḥ śrīsūtavarasya sevanamidaṃ nityaṃ karotīha vai
prānte tasya parā gatirhi niyataṃ satyaṃ śivenoditam
satyaṃ saṃpuṭake nidhāya daśabhiścaivaṃ puṭaiḥ kukkuṭaiḥ
pācyaṃ hema ca raktagairikasamaṃ saṃjāyate niścitam
etatsvarṇabhavaṃ karotica rajaḥ saundaryatāṃ vai sadā
yaḥ seveta naraḥ samān dvidaśakān vṛddhaśca no jāyate
doṣāścaiva garodbhavā viṣakṛtā āgantujā naiva hi
rūpyaṃ hi miśraṃ khalu doṣalaṃ ca
sadyaḥ prāṇavivardhanaṃ jvaraharaṃ sevyaṃ sadā cābhrakam
sauvīraṃ ca rasāṃjanaṃ nigaditaṃ srotoṃjanaṃ caiva hi
kathyante'tra mayāpi śodhanam idaṃ satvaṃ mṛtiścocyate
netravyādhau śodhane ropaṇe ca śreṣṭhaṃ proktaṃ karṇarogapraśāṃtyai //
kaṅkuṣṭha:: third type from the feces of a newborn elephant
vadanti kaṃkuṣṭhamathāpare hi sadyaḥ prasūtasya ca dantinaḥ śakṛt /
tat kṛṣṇapītaṃ bhavatīva recanaṃ tṛtīyamāhurvibudhā bhiṣagvarāḥ //
puṣpākhyaṃ hyaparaṃ guṇaiśca sahitaṃ sevyaṃ sadā rogahṛt
śvetādikaṃ varṇacatuṣṭayaṃ hi sarveṣu ratneṣu ca kathyate budhaiḥ /
strī pumān no strī pumān yacca vajraṃ
dhmātaṃ punardhmāya śataṃ hi vārān kvāthe kulatthasya hi nikṣipecca /
saṃpeṣayettaṃ hi śilātalena manaḥśilābhiḥ saha kārayedvaṭīm //
kṣiptvā nirundhyāpi ca mūṣikāyāṃ puṭānyathāṣṭau ca vanopalairdadet /
vārān śataṃ cāpi tato dhamettaṃ saṃmarditaṃ śodhitapāradena //
vajrāṇi sarvāṇi mṛtībhavanti tadbhasmakaṃ vāritaraṃ bhavecca /
śrīsomadevena ca satyavācā vajrasya mṛtyuḥ kathito hi samyak //
sveditaṃ ca bhiduraṃ hi saptabhirvāsaraiḥ pariniṣecya mūtrake //
dhmāpitaṃ hi khalu vajrasaṃjñakaṃ mārayediti vadanti tadvidaḥ /
nīlajvālāvīrudhaḥ kandakeṣu ghṛṣṭaṃ gharme śoṣitaṃ bhasmabhāvam //
vastreṇa saṃveṣṭya tataḥ prayatnād dolākhyayaṃtre'tha niveśya golakam /
sarvāmlayukte tuṣavāripūrite pātraṃ dṛḍhe mṛṇmayasaṃjñake hi //
sarveṣāṃ hi parīkṣaṇaṃ ca drutayaḥ sammelanaṃ vai rase
adhyāye'tra nidarśitāni sakalānyevaṃ hi karmāṇi vai
eka eva kathitastu so'malaḥ svedito'pi saha cūrṇajalena /
pakvamūṣā kulālabhāṇḍarūpā yā dṛḍhā ca paripācitā /
hiṃgūlaṃ vai hema śuddhaṃ śilā ca
dhānyābhraṃ tulyaṃ paṃkena kṛtvā śrāvaṃ tu pūrayet /
vaṃgaṃ tālakamabhrakaṃ śaśirasaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ viṣaṃ ṭaṃkaṇaṃ /
supācitaṃ vai mṛduvahninā tathā darvīpralepo'pi hi jāyate yathā /
tvakpatrakailāḥ saha kesareṇa palapramāṇā hi tato vidadhyāt //
etaiḥ samānamahiphenamanena cābhraṃ śvetaṃ nidhāya madhunā vaṭakān vidadhyāt
māṣadvayonmitamamuṃ niśi bhakṣayitvā mṛṣṭaṃ payastadanu māhiṣamāśu pītvā
kurvantu kāmukajanāḥ pratiruddhapātāścetāṃsi tāni cakitāni kalāvatīnām
postakaṃ palamekaṃ vai śuṃṭhīkarṣaḥ sitā palaikā ca /
karṣamitā tvakpayasā pītaṃ reto dhruvaṃ dhatte //
grantho'yaṃ grathitaḥ karotu satataṃ saukhyaṃ satāṃ mānase
tatputreṇa yaśodhareṇa kavinā graṃthaḥ svayaṃ nirmitaḥ
